response.original_title: Wakana My first image・さくらわかな
response.overview: The main character of this work is Wakana Sakura! ! She is an adorable beautiful girl with silky long hair, a tall slender figure, and a gentle smile! ! Her hobby is traveling, and her special skill is playing the piano. She is a current female college student who is gentle, classy, ​​and has a good upbringing. Immediately after her debut, Wakana-chan has been attracting attention from various quarters, including being flooded with requests for photo shoots for magazines. Before her first nude image shoot, she studied by watching videos of other models, and is a hard worker who is also very likable. She said, "She went to school where she wore a blazer, so I was happy to be able to wear a sailor suit for this photo shoot," she said with a smile on her face. We want you to see Wakana-chan, the first image of a soft and soothing young lady, emitting a quiet and transparent feeling, as she flaps her wings! !
response.title: Wakana My first image・Wakana Sakura
